name: Out of Fuel (infinirunner)
description:
Carry less to fly more!

You must fly the payload to the merchant ship, but your ship is too heavy with all of its parts! You can drop parts with the icons on the top right in order to fly more easily and save fuel.

Movement => WSAD, Fire => Spacebar Credits: infinirunnerr.itch.io - design, codedefgiraffe.itch.io - design, music, some codeomtdh.itch.io - design, art
